plants.name: Bumbcane
plants.about: Dieffenbachia seguine, is a tropical species that has fast growth and easy handling.
plants.water_tips: Always keep the soil moist without soaking. Water 2 times a week.

plants.name: Zanzibar Gem
plants.about: Despite blooming in spring, it is beautiful and green all year round.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones in the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water once a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: Adapts both to the sun and shade, but prefers to stay in a cool corner, without direct sun.
plants.water_tips: On warmer days, sprinkle water on the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Philodendron
plants.about: Medium sized that adapts to different regions, in addition to being very easy to cultivate. Winning more hearts every day!
plants.water_tips: Always keep the soil moist without soaking. Water 2 times a week.

plants.name: Snake plant
plants.about: Dracaena trifasciata , its fragrance reduces anxiety levels and its smell helps in quality of sleep and productivity during the day.
plants.water_tips: Water the soil around. Water once a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: They are indicated because they are easy to maintain and care for. You put it in small pots, or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Thanks to the water reserve of these little green guys, it is always better to water a little. Water once a week.

plants.name: Fruit plants
plants.about: They require a few hours of sunshine a day, so keep them close to windows.
plants.water_tips: Always water the soil and not the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.about: It brings a feeling of tranquility and peace to the environment. Requires little maintenance and great for those with little space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Require 4 times a week.

plants.name: Violet
plants.about: With delicate flowers. They are great suggestions for decorating the bathroom.
plants.water_tips: Don't water the flowers or leaves. Water the soil 2 times a week.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.about: Hydrangea is a rustic plant and adapts to different types of soils.
plants.water_tips: Always keep the soil moist without soaking. Water once a day.
